properties.title: Java date and time API - Hibernate support - Tasks outstanding
properties.author: Stephen Colebourne

section.name: Tasks outstanding
section.p: Joda-Time-Hibernate is a contributed project. This means that it is not maintained by the main Joda-Time authors in the same way. Contributions are directly welcomed, as would be a regular maintainer.
Contact the mailing lists for more details or to help.
